name: AnimalBuddy
0:
”Alexa open Animal Buddy”
”Alexa load Animal Buddy”
”Alexa start Animal Buddy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: animal buddy
des:
Animal Buddy allows any parent to create an interactive, live character interaction with a stuffed animal. The stuffed animal can read a story, sing a song and tell jokes. The first tells a story of an adventure Jason the fire fighter has. We will be releasing more quick children's stories.

Why not bring to life your child's beloved stuffed animal in a way that only Alexa can?? With the free Alexa app on your phone, your child's animal can interact with them from anywhere your phone is. It is an easy, cheap way to create a wonderous, interactive experience for your child that will live with them for years to come!

If you have an Alexa Show or a TV that can run Alexa, you will see our animated story in amazing detail! Over time we will be rolling out more stories, songs, personalization and much more to create an even larger, more interactive experience.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
